question: Will Alexander Zverev win the 2025 Bitpanda Hamburg Open?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if listed player wins the 2025 Bitpanda Hamburg Open Mens Singles Tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If at any point it becomes impossible for this player to win the Bitpanda Hamburg Open Mens Singles Tournament per the rules of the Bitpanda Hamburg Open, this market will resolve to “No”.

If the 2025 Bitpanda Hamburg Open is permanently canceled or has not been completed by June 19, 2025, 11:59 PM, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the Bitpanda Hamburg Open (https://hamburgopenatp500.com/en/home/), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Celtics vs. Knicks
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for May 16 at 8:00PM ET:
If the Boston Celtics win, the market will resolve to “Celtics”.
If the New York Knicks win, the market will resolve to “Knicks”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Tottenham win on 2025-05-21?
description:
In the upcoming UEL game, scheduled for May 21 at 3:00PM ET,
If Tottenham wins, this market will resolve to “Yes”.
If Tottenham loses, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve “No”.
This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on May 17?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 16 May 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 17 May 12:00 ET candle.
This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 16 May 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 17 May 12:00 ET candle.
If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: White Sox vs. Cubs
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for May 16 at 2:20PM ET:
If the Chicago White Sox win, the market will resolve to “White Sox”.
If the Chicago Cubs win, the market will resolve to “Cubs”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.
